output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Present: Yes (CMF 11240014) - This indicates it's electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly mentions "George Simion" who is a presidential candidate (Position 2).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook post with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly aims to influence voting behavior: - Direct call to vote ("votați") - Explicitly endorses George Simion ("votez George Simion!") - Makes political promises about state institutions
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: While it starts as a personal statement ("Sunt fondatorul..."), it quickly transitions into electoral propaganda with direct calls to vote.
The post violates Article 55 t) as it: - Contains explicit electoral propaganda - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Makes campaign promises - Uses a CMF number - Is being run during the prohibition period

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains explicit calls to vote - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses campaign messaging format with CMF number - Makes campaign promises - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Politic ALIANȚA PENTRU UNIREA ROMÂNILOR, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 1714538599122156) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care contine propaganda electorala explicita pentru candidatul prezidential George Simion. Postarea include indemnuri directe la vot ("votați"), promovare directa a candidatului ("votez George Simion!"), promisiuni electorale despre institutiile statului, si foloseste numar CMF (11240014), demonstrand caracterul sau de propaganda electorala. Impactul electoral este evident prin audienta tintita (10,000-14,999 impresii) si mesajul care incearca sa influenteze comportamentul electoral al votantilor prin promisiuni despre institutiile statului.
